Multiple web sites published articles un: Trump Opens National Parks and Wildlife Refuges for Coal Mining," which were technically true but didn't convey the fact that public lands had not been fully and permanently closed to such activity in the first place.
President Donald Trump signed an executi: Presidential Executive Order on Promoting Energy Independence and Economic Growth" on March 28, 2017, which overturned several environmental regulations implemented during the Obama administration, including the temporary moratorium on the leasing of federal lands for coal mining.
